title: Fast-Rich: High-Performance Terminal UI
shortDescription: High-performance Rust library for rendering rich text and complex terminal user interfaces
description: Fast-Rich is a high-performance Rust library for rendering rich text and complex terminal user interfaces. Inspired by Python's Rich library, it provides a powerful and easy-to-use API for building beautiful CLI applications.

title: RataTalk: Terminal Chat Client
shortDescription: Terminal-based chat client built with Rust and Ratatui
description: RataTalk is a terminal-based chat client built with Rust and Ratatui. It offers a secure, fast, and lightweight way to communicate directly from your terminal, featuring a modern TUI interface.

title: AraCLIP: Cross-Lingual Arabic Image Retrieval
shortDescription: Cross-lingual learning model for effective Arabic text-to-image retrieval using knowledge distillation from CLIP
description: AraCLIP extends the CLIP architecture for Arabic image retrieval tasks. It leverages Knowledge Distillation to transfer cross-modal knowledge from English to Arabic, enhancing its ability to understand Arabic text and retrieve relevant images. The model outperforms state-of-the-art multilingual models by approximately 10% across various evaluation metrics.

title: Structure from Motion Algorithm
shortDescription: Implementation of Structure from Motion algorithm for 3D reconstruction from multiple images
description: Implementation of Structure from Motion (SfM) algorithm for reconstructing 3D scenes from multiple 2D images.

title: Text to Speech for Arabic Poetry
shortDescription: Text-to-speech system specialized for Arabic poetry with proper pronunciation and rhythm
description: A specialized text-to-speech system designed for Arabic poetry, focusing on proper pronunciation, rhythm, and intonation patterns unique to Arabic poetic forms.

title: Mapillary Vistas Dataset Visualizer
shortDescription: Interactive visualizer for the Mapillary Vistas semantic segmentation dataset
description: An interactive visualization tool for exploring the Mapillary Vistas dataset, a large-scale street-level imagery dataset for semantic segmentation.

title: RASA Chatbot with ChatGPT Integration
shortDescription: Integration of RASA framework with ChatGPT for enhanced conversational AI
description: This project integrates RASA with ChatGPT to create an enhanced conversational AI system. The chatbot was designed to act as a therapist and handles various conversations.

title: MASC: Massive Arabic Speech Corpus
shortDescription: Large-scale Arabic speech corpus for automatic speech recognition research
description: MASC is a comprehensive Arabic speech corpus designed for automatic speech recognition research, containing diverse Arabic dialects and speech patterns.

title: Maha NLP Library
shortDescription: Arabic text processing library for NLP tasks
description: Maha is a Python library for Arabic text processing, providing tools for text cleaning, normalization, and preprocessing for NLP applications.

title: Dwai Medical Application
shortDescription: Medical application for healthcare services
description: A medical application designed to provide healthcare services and information to users.

title: Arabic Sign Language Recognition on Raspberry Pi
shortDescription: Real-time Arabic sign language recognition system deployed on Raspberry Pi
description: A compact Arabic Sign Language recognition system optimized for deployment on Raspberry Pi, enabling real-time sign language translation.

title: RGB Arabic Alphabets Sign Language Dataset
shortDescription: Comprehensive RGB dataset for Arabic Alphabets Sign Language recognition
description: A comprehensive RGB dataset for Arabic Alphabets Sign Language recognition, containing diverse samples for training and evaluation of sign language recognition models.

title: GANs for MNIST Digit Generation
shortDescription: Generative Adversarial Networks implementation for MNIST digit generation
description: Implementation of Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) for generating realistic MNIST handwritten digits.

title: Sentiment Analysis using RNN
shortDescription: Recurrent Neural Network for sentiment analysis of text data
description: Implementation of Recurrent Neural Networks for sentiment analysis, classifying text data into positive or negative sentiment categories.

title: Word2Vec Embeddings Implementation
shortDescription: Implementation of Word2Vec algorithm using skip-gram architecture
description: Implementation of the Word2Vec algorithm using skip-gram architecture for learning word embeddings from text corpora.

title: TV Script Generation
shortDescription: RNN-based TV script generation using deep learning
description: Using Recurrent Neural Networks to generate TV scripts by learning patterns from existing scripts.

title: MNIST Prediction using Neural Network
shortDescription: Neural network for MNIST handwritten digit classification
description: Implementation of a neural network for classifying MNIST handwritten digits with high accuracy.

title: Bike Sharing Demand Prediction
shortDescription: Machine learning model for predicting bike sharing demand
description: A machine learning model for predicting bike sharing demand based on various features like weather, time, and seasonality.

title: Memory Management Chatbot
shortDescription: Chatbot implementation with memory management concepts in C++
description: A chatbot implementation that demonstrates memory management concepts in C++, part of the Udacity C++ Nanodegree program.

title: Arabic Sign Language Recognition using Deep Learning
shortDescription: Deep learning models for Arabic Sign Language recognition
description: Implementation of deep learning models for recognizing Arabic Sign Language gestures from images and video.

title: DC Motor Control using PWM
shortDescription: Controlling DC motor using PWM with PIC16F778 microcontroller
description: Implementation of DC motor speed control using Pulse Width Modulation (PWM) on a PIC16F778 microcontroller.

title: FPGA Architecture Projects
shortDescription: Field-Programmable Gate Array architecture projects
description: Various projects implemented on FPGA including digital design exercises and embedded systems applications.

title: CNC Machine Projects
shortDescription: Computer numerical control machine projects
description: Projects involving CNC (Computer Numerical Control) machines for automated manufacturing and precision machining.

title: Industrial Automation Projects
shortDescription: Industrial automation systems and control projects
description: Various industrial automation projects involving PLCs, sensors, and automated control systems.
